title: Senior Rust Developer - Nostr Infrastructure
description:
## About the Role

We're seeking an experienced Rust developer to build next-generation decentralized infrastructure on Nostr. You'll work on high-performance relay implementations, cryptographic protocols, and Lightning Network integrations.

## What You'll Do

- Design and implement Nostr relay optimizations
- Build Lightning-enabled payment flows
- Develop client SDKs and developer tools
- Contribute to NIP specifications
- Mentor junior engineers

## Requirements

- 5+ years of Rust experience in production
- Deep understanding of async/await patterns
- Experience with cryptographic primitives
- Familiarity with WebSockets and networking protocols
- Bonus: Previous work on Bitcoin/Lightning/Nostr

## What We Offer

- Competitive salary + equity
- Remote-first culture
- Conference travel budget
- Open source contribution time
- Latest hardware

## About Us

Acme Corp is building the future of decentralized social media. We're a fully remote team of 25 engineers, designers, and researchers passionate about user sovereignty and open protocols.
qualifications: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or equivalent experience. 5+ years of professional Rust development. Strong understanding of distributed systems and cryptography.
responsibilities: Design and implement high-performance Nostr relays. Build Lightning payment integrations. Develop client libraries and SDKs. Review code and mentor team members. Contribute to protocol specifications.
workHours: Flexible hours with 4-hour overlap in UTC-8 timezone
